# tg_policy (Data Source)

Fetch a policy by name.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Policy name

### Read-Only

- `conditions` (List of Object) Policy conditions (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--conditions))
- `description` (String) Policy description
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `resources` (List of String) Resources
- `statement` (List of Object) Policy statements (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--statement))
